sentences.en: After introspection for three months, he visited Laodan again to report his learning from introspection.
sentences.cn: 历经三个月苦思, 他再度到老聃那儿,将自己的研究心得向老聃报告.

sentences.en: Behaviourism leaves out of account consciousness and introspection.
sentences.cn: 行为主义不把意识和内省考虑在内.

sentences.en: He had always had his moments of quiet introspection.
sentences.cn: 他总有安静自省的时候。

sentences.en: He isn't prone to introspection and he plays down his role in his son's life.
sentences.cn: 他不喜欢反省自己,而且他不认为自己在儿子的生活中有多大的重要性.

sentences.en: He thus typified the constant introspection wherewith he tortured, but could not purify himself.
sentences.cn: 他就这样不断地自省,其实只是在自我折磨, 丝毫得不到自我净化.

sentences.en: In a sudden introspection we start to review the digital world.
sentences.cn: 冥然内省,我们重新审视电子的世界.

sentences.en: Introspection by a Platonic viewpoint: object modeling.
sentences.cn: 柏拉图式内省: 对象建模.

sentences.en: Introspection by an Aristotelian viewpoint: generalization.
sentences.cn: 亚里士多德式内省: 推广.

sentences.en: Introspection is the best guideline for life.
sentences.cn: 自省是最好的人生指导.

sentences.en: Marxs whole theoretical subject consists of the understanding, the introspection and the criticism to modernity.
sentences.cn: 对现代性的理解 、 反省和批判构成了马克思毕生的理论主题.

sentences.en: MOON CYCLES FOR INTROSPECTION AND ASCENSION.
sentences.cn: 用于内省与提升的月亮周期.

sentences.en: Spiritually inclined, you tend to take a step back from the world in introspection.
sentences.cn: 精神上倾斜, 您倾向于收回步骤从世界在内省.

sentences.en: The Hermit is a card of introspection , analysis and , well , virginity.
sentences.cn: 隐者是一张关于自省 、 分析和贞节的牌.

sentences.en: The psychological intervention pattern after crisis event included review, understanding, introspection and guide.
sentences.cn: 危机事件后的心理干预模式为:回顾 、 理解 、 反思和引导.

sentences.en: Very apparent, chinese larch capital needs introspection in investment strategy of home.
sentences.cn: 很显然, 红杉资本在国内的投资策略需要反省.

sentences.en: You'd do very well at a spiritual retreat that encourages meditation , prayer and introspection.
sentences.cn: 只有身处这样的地方,你才可以让自己的心灵得到净化.

trans.tran_en: the process of thinking deeply about your own thoughts, feelings, or behaviour
